<i class="fa fa-cube"></i> R packages {#rpackages}
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- <i class="fa fa-link"></i> [{excluder}](https://docs.ropensci.org/excluder/)
Facilitates checking for, marking, and excluding rows of data frames in online data surveys

- <i class="fa fa-link"></i> [{flashr}](https://jeffreyrstevens.github.io/flashr/)
Creates flashcards for learning terms and descriptions to help learns remember R functions

- <i class="fa fa-link"></i> [{cocoon}](https://github.com/JeffreyRStevens/cocoon)
Flexibly formats statistical output to insert into R Markdown/Quarto documents

- <i class="fa fa-link"></i> [{ncaavolleyballr}](https://github.com/JeffreyRStevens/ncaavolleyballr)
Extracts data from NCAA volleyball website

Main
================================================================================

Jeffrey R. Stevens {#title}
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I am a researcher who uses and teaches about data science. My research investigates decision making
in humans and other animals. My scientific workflow incorporates R and other tools
to generate reproducible research.
